Easy as Pi Mathematics

Does your child need help with homework or studying for tests? Would they like to feel more confident in class? We will work with your child to identify problem areas and customize a program that will help them gain confidence and start excelling in Math.

Focused Math Tutoring Attention

I signed my daughter up with Easy as Pi from a referral via Leavitt middle school. I had previously had her in other large tutoring centers where there just wasn't enough one-on-one attention for each kid. My daughter really needed that extra attention, so when I found Easy as Pi, I was pleasantly surprised! Her instructor was very hands on and patient, and really took the time to bring her up to speed. Now my daughter is beyond expected in math, and ready to take on high school! Thanks Easy as Pi!

- Amber Orozco

Algebra Improvement Results

What a life saver Easy as Pi has been for our son. He struggled with Algebra for two years, failing every quiz and test. After only a couple of weeks with Dayleen and Andrew, he got a 95% on his test! Amazing!! His understanding of the material has increased leaps and bounds, and his confidence has soared remarkably. We love Easy as Pi! Great location, flexible schedule, but best of all: AWESOME RESULTS!

- Robyn Hassing

Stress-Free Math Help

Easy As Pi Mathematics has been a life saver for us. Math is not my strong suit, so trying to help my son would just stress us both out to the extreme. Dayleen at Easy as Pi is patient and kind, and has put together a wonderful, effective program to keep kids interested and develop confidence as they learn. Our son went from very low C's to high B's in a short time, and now feels self-reliant and assured when he sits down to his math homework.

- Alicia Cuglietta

I Love Easy as Pi!

My son has not been interested in math for the past year. I signed him up for camp and he loved it! He was excited about going to math camp and when I woke him up on the last day he said, "No!!! I don't want it to be over!" Love Easy as Pi! Awesome place with the perfect way of making learning fun! Thank you thank you!

- Jolynn Stagg

Math Confidence Advantage

My three boys love the summer camp program. The information and experiments they experienced has been life changing for them and really gave them an advantage going into the school year. The classes are small and well-taught and the classes fill up fast.

- Shannon Bentham

Push Your Child's Limits

Is your child doing well in math, but could use more of a challenge? This is very common with children that love math. We will customize a plan that will challenge and motivate your child. This will help your child to excel in math and other areas such as Physics and Engineering.


Testing

We test each child at their current grade level and move backward or forward based on their abilities. Some children that excel at math, might have still missed a few concepts along the way. We make sure they have everything down before we move ahead.

  • Individualized Math Program
  • Homework Help
  • Private Tutoring Available

Motiviation

We offer fun incentives for kids to help keep them motivated to learn and progress. Kids love making their lego avatar and moving them along our obstacle course.


Environment

The environment at Easy as Pi is very inviting and fun for kids. The tutors are knowledgeable, understanding and encouraging, yet still fun. Even the high schoolers love coming to Easy as Pi.

  • Inviting and Fun Atmosphere
  • Knowledgeable Math Tutors
  • Great Incentives

Inspiration

In order to understand the universe, you must know the language in which it was written, and that language is mathematics. -Galileo Galilei


Our Math Tutors

The tutors at Easy as Pi are committed to helping your child succeed. They are knowledgeable, patient, kind and know how to motivate your child. Most of our tutors have straight A's in every subject in high school and received almost perfect scores on the math portion of the ACT. Every tutor has taken all math classes up to Pre-Calculus and received superior grades. The most important thing is that our math tutors are great with kids. Kids love the one on one attention they receive at Easy as Pi!
